name: Aquacreep!
description:
When an alien shapeshifter poses as human, who will you trust?NOTE: This game changes on each playthrough, so in order to do well, you need to EXPLORE AND INVESTIGATE to get all the info you can! Be smart to survive, good luck, and trust NO ONE!

In a scenario that plays like the movie "The Thing", a shapeshifter has infiltrated your diving crew, and now you must figure which of them is human, and which is something else...

-----------------------------

This game part of the "Astrocreep" games. They are about an ALIEN THAT ASSIMILATES OTHER ORGANISMS ( LIKE "THE THING" ). Consider playing another in the series if this kind of subject interest you:
